EnumProperty.Name: InstallerPlatforms
EnumProperty.Description: Select what platforms to include in the installer.

EnumValue.Name: Win32
EnumValue.Description: Build installer with 32-bit version of the program.

EnumValue.Name: x64
EnumValue.Description: Build installer with 64-bit version of the program.

EnumValue.Name: Both
EnumValue.Description: Build installer with 32-bit and 64-bit version of the program.

EnumProperty.Name: InstallerSDKLibs
EnumProperty.Description: Select what type of SDK libraries to include into Models Creator.

EnumValue.Name: Precompiled
EnumValue.Description: Models Creator with precompiled SDK libraries.

EnumValue.Name: Sources
EnumValue.Description: Models Creator with source files of SDK libraries.
